text: Danica Roem ( ; born September 30, 1984) is an American journalist and politician who has been a member of the Senate of Virginia since 2024. She is a member of the Democratic Party. In the 2017 Virginia elections she was elected to the Virginia House of Delegates. She is the first openly transgender person to be elected to the Virginia General Assembly, and in January 2018 became the first to both be elected and serve while openly transgender in any U.S. state legislature. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:Transgender women Category:American LGBT politicians Category:Writers from Virginia Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Danica Roem
